name: py-ray
description:
A system for parallel and distributed Python that unifies the ML
ecosystem.

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.name: bazel
dependencies.description:
Bazel is an open-source build and test tool similar to Make, Maven, and
Gradle. It uses a human-readable, high-level build language. Bazel
supports projects in multiple languages and builds outputs for multiple
platforms. Bazel supports large codebases across multiple repositories,
and large numbers of users.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-cython
dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.

dependencies.name: py-aiohttp
dependencies.description:
Supports both client and server side of HTTP protocol. Supports both
client and server Web-Sockets out-of-the-box and avoids Callbacks.
Provides Web-server with middlewares and plugable routing.

dependencies.name: py-aioredis
dependencies.description: asyncio (PEP 3156) Redis support.

dependencies.name: py-click
dependencies.description: Python composable command line interface toolkit.

dependencies.name: py-colorama
dependencies.description: Cross-platform colored terminal text.

dependencies.name: py-colorful
dependencies.description: Terminal string styling done right, in Python.

dependencies.name: py-filelock
dependencies.description:
A platform-independent file lock for Python. This package contains a
single module, which implements a platform independent file lock in
Python, which provides a simple way of inter-process communication

dependencies.name: py-google
dependencies.description: Python bindings to the Google search engine.

dependencies.name: py-gpustat
dependencies.description: An utility to monitor NVIDIA GPU status and usage.

dependencies.name: py-grpcio
dependencies.description: HTTP/2-based RPC framework.

dependencies.name: py-jsonschema
dependencies.description: Jsonschema: An(other) implementation of JSON Schema for Python.

dependencies.name: py-msgpack
dependencies.description: MessagePack (de)serializer.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description:
NumPy is the fundamental package for scientific computing with Python.
It contains among other things: a powerful N-dimensional array object,
sophisticated (broadcasting) functions, tools for integrating C/C++ and
Fortran code, and useful linear algebra, Fourier transform, and random
number capabilities

dependencies.name: py-protobuf
dependencies.description:
Protocol buffers are Google's language-neutral, platform-neutral,
extensible mechanism for serializing structured data - think XML, but
smaller, faster, and simpler. You define how you want your data to be
structured once, then you can use special generated source code to
easily write and read your structured data to and from a variety of data
streams and using a variety of languages.

dependencies.name: py-py-spy
dependencies.description: A Sampling Profiler for Python.

dependencies.name: py-pyyaml
dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

dependencies.name: py-requests
dependencies.description: Python HTTP for Humans.

dependencies.name: py-redis
dependencies.description: The Python interface to the Redis key-value store.

dependencies.name: py-opencensus
dependencies.description: A stats collection and distributed tracing framework.

dependencies.name: py-prometheus-client
dependencies.description: Prometheus instrumentation library for Python applications.

dependent_to.name: py-horovod
dependent_to.description:
Horovod is a distributed deep learning training framework for
TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, and Apache MXNet.

dependent_to.name: py-ytopt
dependent_to.description:
Ytopt package implements search using Random Forest (SuRF), an
autotuning search method developed within Y-Tune ECP project.
